headline: Garmin wins National Boating Safety Award for the fifth straight year
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's largest1 and most innovative marine electronics manufacturer, has been awarded a 2025 National Boating Safety Award from the Sea Tow Foundation for the fifth consecutive year. The award, presented in cooperation with the Boating Safety Advisory Council on Oct. 8, highlights for-profit companies in the recreational boating industry that promote safe and responsible boating.

content.title: Garmin wins National Boating Safety Award for the fifth straight year
content.summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's largest1 and most innovative marine electronics manufacturer, has been awarded a 2025 National Boating Safety Award from the Sea Tow Foundation for the fifth consecutive year. The award, presented in cooperation with the Boating Safety Advisory Council on Oct. 8, highlights for-profit companies in the recreational boating industry that promote safe and responsible boating.

thumbnail.caption: The Sea Tow Foundation honors Garmin for helping educate customers and the public about the importance of safe and responsible boating.
